Cyber Claw:








Cyber Claw eyed the edge of the water of the ocean. They were near the shore 
now. She mused at the plan she was going to take by chance. Her skills on 
imitating her male double were going to be tested. It had to work better 
than she had done it before. But she thought it might be a little easier 
than it seemed. Dinobot was dead, and she had been out of battle for many 
months or years. She wasn't even sure. She just had to play her part.

If there were bots that knew her near that shore, and noticed her robot 
mode, there would be trouble. Dinobot couldn't fly, so there was no fooling 
them. She had to think of an excuse.

"If they see me in my robot mode," she announced to the two bots beside her. 
"I'm one dead bot. Beast mode."

She transformed to her beast mode, plummeting to the waters, twisting her 
body, she landed head first. She went head over heels, kicking her legs 
underwater, turning her body to the shining surface. She lifted her head 
into the salty air, exhaling first, then took a few breaths. She shook her 
head, lifting her ears out of the waters. She lunged forward a few seconds, 
testing her body weight with the ocean waters. She soon went into a smooth 
swim across, her head and neck bobbing to her movements. Doing things like 
this saved her life: swimming, climbing trees, flying....
